welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nnewi, a city known for its vibrant culture, friendly people, and rich history. We invite you to explore our charming streets, savor the local cuisine, and immerse yourself in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Schools
restaurants.description: Schools is a african restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Nnewi Town Anambra Nigeria
restaurants.description: Nnewi Town Anambra Nigeria is a eastern european restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Asaba International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Asaba International Airport handles all import and export shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.
